sentences.sContent: Otherwise, the suffix will not be added.
sentences.sContent_eng: Otherwise, the suffix will not be added.
sentences.sCn: 否则，后缀将不会被添加。

sentences.sContent: This required that all subtrees are all under the same suffix, since there is no common parent between suffixes.
sentences.sContent_eng: This required that all subtrees are all under the same suffix, since there is no common parent between suffixes.
sentences.sCn: 这需要所有的子树都位于相同的后缀中，因为后缀之间不存在公共父节点。

sentences.sContent: But only if the GAC as a whole does not like a suffix must the board take these objections into account—and then issue a detailed explanation if it overrides them.
sentences.sContent_eng: But only if the GAC as a whole does not like a suffix must the board take these objections into account—and then issue a detailed explanation if it overrides them.
sentences.sCn: 但是，只有在GAC也不同意新域名后缀的情况下，董事会才会考虑这些反对意见。 而且如果要撤销这些域名的话，它需要发布一份详细的解释报告。

trans.tranOther: a letter or letters added to the end of a word to form a new word, such as ‘ness’ in ‘kindness’ or ‘ly’ in ‘suddenly’
